name: Bombs Ahoy
description:
Bounce back a bomb between you and a friend as you try and bring down each others pirate ships!

While your opponent juggles the bomb, mash the detonator so it explodes on them quicker!

A game by tom hambly.

CONTROLS
Player one - W, A, D
Player Two - I, J, L
Detonate the bomb quicker - Mouse Left Click
